data.name: Tales of Arise - +5 Level Up 3
data.detailed_description:
System expansion item that grants +5 levels to your entire party once you claim it from the in-game Unclaimed DLC List.

*This content will be available in-game after claiming it from the in-game Unclaimed DLC List.
*You cannot go above the max level cap of 100.
data.about_the_game:
System expansion item that grants +5 levels to your entire party once you claim it from the in-game Unclaimed DLC List.

*This content will be available in-game after claiming it from the in-game Unclaimed DLC List.

data.short_description: System expansion item that grants +5 levels to your entire party once you claim it from the in-game Unclaimed DLC List.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit Only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
